post.author: Admin
post.title: Senior Band Night
post.description: Good Evening Board, We are including the invitation for the Senior Band dinner on October 20th. In y
post.content:
You are cordially invited to attend:

North Royalton’s Senior Band Night
Friday, October 20, 2017

Honoring all Senior Band Students and their Parents

Reception will be Friday, October 20, 2017 5:00 - 6:15PM2017 5:00 - 6:15PM

Dinner will be served at 5:15 PM in Cafeteria II (by the band room)

Augie’s Pizza and Catering will be used for the dinner.

Dinner includes:

  • Chicken Marsala
  • Broccoli, Cauliflower, Carrot Vegetable medley
  • Roasted Red Potato
  • Zitti Pasta with Marinara Sauce
  • Tossed Salad with House Italian Dressing
  • Rolls & Butter

All Seniors will receive Corsages or Boutonnieres and their parents will each receive a rose.

RSVP Card is due by October 12, 2017.  RSVP paper is attached to this email, on the Band Booster website OR in the band room!

6:40PM — Pre-Game Show
7:00PM — Home Football Game

  • Two complimentary admissions to the football game will be granted per family.  This will be based on the information provided on the RSVP Card.  Please check in at the SOUTH END gate where the North Royalton High School Marching Band enters and exits the field.
  • After PRE-GAME show, parents can meet with their Senior band member behind the band bleachers at the south end of the football field.  Pictures will be taken and line up will begin.

During HALF-TIME of the football game, Seniors and their parents will be announced and recognized on the football field.

Senior Band Night RSVP 2017
